name: CONFIGURATION_IEEE_FORMAT_ENABLED
briefdescription: IEEE format enabled for word swap

name: CONFIGURATION_IEEE_FORMAT_DISABLED
briefdescription: IEEE format disabled for word swap

name: IEEE_FORMAT_COUNT
briefdescription: Total nof IEE format for WORD swap

name: MAX_SERIAL_ADU_MESSAGE_SIZE
briefdescription: Maximum size of a serial based ADU message. This is the PDU with associated slave device id and checksum.

name: MAX_TCP_ADU_MESSAGE_SIZE
briefdescription: Maximum size of a TCP based ADU message. This is the PDU with associated TCP information.

name: MAX_PDU_MESSAGE_SIZE
briefdescription: Maximum size of a Modbus PDU message buffer in bytes - this is the buffer without any addressing or checksum information

name: MAX_DATA_SIZE
briefdescription: Maximum number of data bytes that can fit in a Modbus message buffer

name: COILS_PER_BYTE
briefdescription: Maximum number of coils that will fit in a byte

name: BYTES_PER_REGISTER
briefdescription: Number of bytes that will fit into a register

name: TCP_PORT
briefdescription: Modbus TCP server listening TCP port

name: TCP_MAX_CLIENTS
briefdescription: How many Modbus TCP connections can be active at the same time

name: MAX_SIMULTANEOUS_TRANSACTIONS
briefdescription: How many transaction can be ongoing at the same How many transaction can be ongoing at the same How many transaction can be ongoing at the same time

name: TCP_ADU_RESEGMENTATION_TIMEOUT_IN_MS
briefdescription: Time for client to provide full Modbus TCP ADU

name: MANUFACTUR_AND_DEVICE_ID
briefdescription: 1A is for ABB and A0 for Coriolis
